PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeWasteDisposalUnit
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Electrically operated device that reduces kitchen or other waste into fragments small enough to be flushed into a drainage system.

PropertyDef.Name: DrainConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the drain connection inlet to the waste disposal unit.

PropertyDef.Name: OutletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the outlet connection from the waste disposal unit

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted depth of the object measured from the inlet drain connection to the base of the unit.
